title: 168.54 MOTOR VEHICLES, TRANSFER OF OWNERSHIP.
text:
MS 1969 [Repealed, 1971 c 25 s 37]
MS 1978 [Repealed, 1979 c 333 s 108]
MS 1978 [Repealed, 1979 c 333 s 108]
A fee of $3 is imposed upon every transfer of ownership by the commissioner of any vehicle for which a registration certificate has heretofore been issued under this chapter, except vehicles sold for the purposes of salvage, dismantling, or permanent removal from the state.
The commissioner shall collect the proceeds of the fee imposed under this section and deposit them in the general fund pursuant to section 168A.31.
MS 2000 [Repealed, 2001 c 7 s 91]
